comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:11.0a2) Gecko/20111222 Firefox/11.0a2
Build ID: 20111222042023

Steps to reproduce:

Right clicked on an image (any image will do), hovered over "View image" (or "View background image") in the context menu and pressed the middle mouse button to open the image in a new tab in the background (with the "Open tabs in background" pref set to true).


Actual results:

The image opened in a new tab that immediately got the focus.


Expected results:

The image should have opened in a new tab in the background with the focus staying on the tab that I was on.
comments.creator: Bugzilla2-Briareos@sneakemail.com
